name: Transport Giant: Gold Edition 2012
summary: It's the year 1850, start of the era of mass-production. That means new and great opportunities for smart entrepreneurs: with the little funds you have and a good business strategy, you will be able to build enpires, both in the old world and in the fastest growing cities in the U.S. But how do the goods get to their destinations? Who will transport the massive amounts of resources? Invest your funds and build an evergrowing empire.
